properties.name: 9-11 Memorial
properties.description: Posted by Totalchaos101New yorkWe want to especially remember the firefighters, the policemen, the medical persons, rescue workers, and all the common people who had helped others on the attack sites during the actual disaster days, and those who helped to clean up in the aftermath of 9-11-01. Some of them accomplished some truly heroic tasks, and deserve to be called heroes!

properties.name: Bulls arena
properties.description: Posted by Totalchaos101ChicagoThe Bulls began NBA play in 1966, and in the mid-1970s the team won more than 50 games in four seasons. The arrival of Michael Jordan in the mid-1980s marked the beginning of a new period of success for Chicago, winning three straight NBA titles (1991-1993). Jordan retired in 1993, but he returned to the Bulls in 1995, the team won three more NBA championships—in 1996, 1997, and 1998. Chicago is one of five franchises to have won consecutive NBA titles.

properties.name: Colin Powell first African-American Secretary of State
properties.description: Posted by Totalchaos1011925 K St NW, Washington, 20006On December 16th in the year 2000 Colin Powell was apppointed as a Secratery of the state. He was the African american male to be the secratery of state.At his position he is the head of America foreign policy

properties.name: Disne world Theme parks
properties.description: Posted by Totalchaos101FloridaDisney opened on July 17th, 1955. It was called the "happiest place on the earth." Walt Elias Disney was the creator of the parks.He died December 15, 1966.

properties.name: Easter island
properties.description: Posted by Totalchaos101asiaEaster island is a small praire believed to be of volcainic origin.Ther are statues of head on the island.The statues are over 6 inches and over 14 tons.Mysteries have been made on how the statues have been made but no one has found out.

properties.name: Hollywood Walk of Fame
properties.description: Posted by Totalchaos101The Walk of Fame is set with more than 2,500 polished marble stars. Celebrities from the worlds of film, radio, television, theater, and music had been remembered here. Just how celebrities make the final Walk of Fame cut, the decision is made by the Hollywood Chamber of Commerce celebrities had to fit into one of the categories and pay $ 7,500 to get their names walked on by the public.

properties.name: Lac Rose
properties.description: Posted by Totalchaos101SenegalLac Rose is a lake that is so full of salt and minerals that it is literally pink. "Lac Rose" means Pink Lake in french. Everyday the tribesmen mine the salt out and the mierals out of it.It is mined out in large quantities.

properties.name: Leaning tower of Pisa
properties.description: Posted by Totalchaos101ItalyThis is a bell tower of a cathedral. The construction began in August of 1173.The architect who created this massive piece of art is still unknown.It is has been standing for pver 300 years.

properties.name: MT. Rushmore
properties.description: Posted by Totalchaos101South DakotaMT. Rushmore is a national monument. Remembering all of the U.S\'s greatest president\'s.It reminds people that anything is possible. Gutzon Borglum was one of the main carvers in the whole project.It has been standing since October of 1941

properties.name: Mandalay bay hotel
properties.description: Posted by Totalchaos101 Las vegasThis is a beautiful hotel that has fun for the young and the old. It consists of an underground shark reef,a wave pool,casino,boxing ring and a Beautiful view of Las Vegas\'s night lights

properties.name: Sears Tower
properties.description: Posted by Totalchaos101ChicagoThe sears tower construction began in the late 1970\'s. It was designed by Skidmore, Owings, and Merrill.It took the construction three years to finish. The tower was opened in 1973.

properties.name: Strawberry festival
properties.description: Posted by Totalchaos101plant city FlThis is a place full of fun. There are concerts and exhilirating rides. Ther are exhibits of agriculture, commerce, industry, livestock, fine arts, horticulture, and crafts. Plant City is one the Strawberry capitals in the world. The Strawberry festival has livestock competitions and marching Bands.The Strawberry festival lives in the home of the strawberry capital in the U.S. It started in the 1930\'s when members of the Plant City Lion\'s Club wanted to celbrate the abundant growth and good crop of their strawberries.

properties.name: west Edmonton mall
properties.description: Posted by Totalchaos101 CanadaThe west Edmonton mall is a mll and a theme park there are water rides, a carnival, and all the stores aperson can think of it is the world\'s largest shopping mall
